name: Type Off
description:
A short 6 min typing speed game.

Random characters pop up from the left side and move toward the right side of the screen. You lose a life if any character disappears after hitting the right edge. Moreover, you only have three lives. No respawn.

Can you make it to the end?

Enhance your touch typing skill

This game is fun if you are learning touch typing skill. Get your fingers exercising by trying to coordinate your hand-eye as you type off those random letters.

Unique score board
  • Type as fast as you can, make mistakes along the way, score an impressive Characters Per Minute (CPM) count and get it listed on the score board.
  • Or you could be more strategic and make less typing mistakes to earn yourself a "clean" badge.
